meteringrange: EV 1-20 (at 73Â°F/23Â°C with EF 50mm f/1.4     USM lens, ISO 100)
isospeedrange: Manually set by user, in P, Tv, Av, and M     modes Â ISO 100 thru 6400 (in 1/3 or full-stop increments) Automatic ISO setting in P, Tv, Av, and M modes Â ISO 100?6400;     User-defined maximum ISO limit can be set from 400 thru 6400, in     full-step increments (Firmware Version 2.0.X is required) When Highlight Tone Priority is active: minimum possible ISO is 200 Automatic ISO setting in Basic Zone modes Â ISO 100 thru 3200
shutterspeeds: 30 seconds to 1/8000th second;     user-settable in 1/3 or full-step increments (available shutter speeds     vary by shooting mode); plus Bulb X-sync at 1/250th second with EOS Speedlites
inviewfinder: The AF point display is used to indicate     up to Â±6Â° roll and Â±4Â° pitch in 1Â° increments (during vertical shooting,     up to Â±4Â° roll and Â±6Â° pitch).

continuousshootingtime: Approx. 12 min. (Full HD); 12 min. (HD);     24 min. (SD) Based on Canon's testing standards using a 4GB card.

onlcdmonitor: Electronic level indicates up to 360Â° roll     and Â±10Â° pitch in 1Â° increments.

compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses including EF-S lenses     (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6x the lens focal length)
afpointselection: (1) Manual selection: Single point AF (2) Manual selection: Spot AF (3) Manual selection: AF point expansion (4) Manual selection: Zone AF (5) Automatic selection: 19 point AF
settings: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten     Light, White Fluorescent Light, Flash, Custom, Color Temperature setting
productname: EOS 7D EF 28-135mm IS Digital Camera Kit     with Custom Gadget Bag 100EG and 8GB High Speed UDMA Compact Flash Card
recordingfunctions: Images record directly to the CF card.     With the WFT-E5A attached, image recording to the CF card and to the USB     external media connected to the WFT-E5A will be possible as follows: (1) Standard (2) Automatic switching of recording media (3) Separate recording (4) Recording of identical images (5) Backup to external recording media
erase: Single image, check-marked images or all     images in the CF card can be erased (except protected images)
mirror: Quick-return half mirror (transmittance:     reflectance ratio of 40:60) with EF600mm f/4L IS USM or shorter lenses)
afassistbeam: When an external EOS-dedicated Speedlite     is attached to the camera, the AF-assist beam from the Speedlite will be     emitted when necessary.
shutterlagtime: Approx. 0.059 sec., according to Canon     Inc. test methods and criteria
aelock: Auto: Applied in One-Shot AF mode with     evaluative metering when focus is achieved User-applied: By AE lock button
backuprecording: Enabled with Wireless File Transmitter     WFT-E5A attached
brightnesscontrol: Auto: Brightness adjusted automatically by     the light sensor, Manual: 7 levels provided
protection: Single images can be erase-protected or     not
shootingmodes: Still photo shooting and video shooting
colortemperaturecompensation: White Balance Correction: Â± up to 9     levels, in 1-step increments White Balance Bracketing: Â± up to 3 levels, in 1-step increments
flashcoverage: 15mm lens angle of view (equivalent to     approx. 24mm in 135 format)

fileformat: MOV (image data: H.264; audio: Linear PCM     (monaural))
powersaving: Provided. Power turns off after 1, 2, 4,     8, 15 or 30 min.
interfacelanguages: 25 (English, German, French, Dutch,     Danish, Portuguese, Finnish, Italian, Norwegian, Swedish, Spanish,     Greek, Russian, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Ukraine, Turkish,     Arabic, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean and     Japanese)
battery: One Battery Pack LP-E6 AC power can be supplied via AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6 With Battery Grip BG-E7 attached.
recordingmedia: CF Card Type I and II, UDMA-compliant CF     cards, via external media (USB v.2.0 hard drive, via optional Wireless     File Transmitter WFT-E5A)
exposurecontrolsystems: Program AE (Shiftable), Shutter-priority     AE, Aperture-priority AE, Creative Auto, Full auto, Manual exposure,     E-TTL II autoflash program AE
magnification: Approx. 1.0x (-1m-1 with 50mm lens at     infinity)/29.4Â° angle of view
recordingformat: Design rule for Camera File System 2.0 and     Exif 2.21
filesize: Recording Size: 1920 x 1080 (Full HD),     1280 x 720 (SD), 640 x 480 (SD)
autowhitebalance: Auto white balance with the image sensor
filenumbering: Consecutive numbering, auto reset, manual     reset. Possible to create new folders and select folders in the CF card. Firmware Version 2.0.X allows manually setting the file name, the first     four alphanumeric characters, or the first three alphanumeric characters     + image size.
imageformat: Still: JPEG, RAW (14-bit, Canon original),     sRAW, mRAW, RAW+JPEG Video: MOV (Image data: H.264, Audio: Linear PCM)
focusing: Autofocus: Quick mode, Live mode, Face     Detection Live mode; manual
dustdeletionfeature: (1) Automatic Sensor Cleaning (2) Dust Delete Data appended to the captured image (3) Manual cleaning of sensor
flashmeteringsystem: E-TTL II auto flash; Manual flash and     Multi flash also possible.
afpoints: 19-point all cross-type AF (f/2.8 at     center: Dual Cross Sensor)
focusingmodes: (1) Autofocus One-Shot AF Predictive AI Servo AF AI Focus AF (Switches between One-Shot AF and AI SERVO AF automatically) (2) Manual focus (MF)
usbterminal: For personal computer communication and     direct printing (USB 2.0 Hi-Speed), used for connecting the Canon GP-E2     GPS Receiver
extensionsystemterminal: For connection to optional Wireless File     Transmitter WFT-E5A
selectedafpointdisplay: Indicated by superimposed display in the     viewfinder and on the LCD monitor

videooutterminal: (1) Video OUT terminal: NTSC/PAL     selectable (2) mini-HDMI OUT terminal
meteringmodes: Evaluative metering with the image sensor     (still photos) Center-weighted average metering (video)
printableimages: JPEG images compliant to Design rule for     Camera File System (DPOF printing possible) and RAW/sRAW images captured     with the EOS 7D
affunctionregistrationswitching: With a Custom Function, four types of AF     function settings can be registered in a group: 1. AF area selection     mode, 2. AI Servo tracking sensitivity, 3. AI Servo AF tracking method,     and 4. AI Servo 1st/2nd img priority.
continuousshootingspeed: High-speed: Max. 8.0 shots/sec. Low-speed: Max. 3.0 shots/sec.
lowpassfilter: Fixed position in front of the CMOS sensor
viewfinderinformation: AF iinformation (AF points, focus     confirmation light), Exposure information (Shutter speed, aperture, ISO     speed, AE lock, exposure level, spot metering circle, exposure warning),     Flash information (Flash-ready, flash exposure compensation, high-speed     sync, FE lock, red-eye reduction light), Image information (Highlight     tone priority, Monochrome shooting, maximum burst, white balance     correction, CF card information), Composition information (Grid,     electronic level), Battery check
customcontrols: The following camera controls can be     customized by assigning the desired function: Shutter button halfway     pressing, AF-ON button, AE lock button, depth-of-preview button, lens AF     Stop button, Multifunction button, SET button, Main Dial, Quick Control     Dial, and Multicontroller.
displayformat: Single image, Single image +     Image-recording quality/shooting information, histogram, 4- or 9-image     index, magnified view (approx. 1.5x-10x), rotated image (auto/manual),     image jump (by 10/100 images, index screen, by shooting date, by     folder), slide show (all images/selected by date/folder)
maximumburst: JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 110/approx. 130 RAW: approx. 23/approx. 25 RAW+JPEG (Large/Fine): approx. 17/approx. 17
